subject: Football
Lockouts
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. said it would not suspend Tampa Bay cornerback Aqib Talib or Tennessee receiver Kenny Britt for any games this season, even though they had significant brushes with the law during the lockout.
snippet: The N.F.L. said it would not suspend Tampa Bay cornerback Aqib Talib or Tennessee receiver Kenny Britt for any games this season, even though they had significant brushes with the law during the lockout.
